command.description: Runs command(s) for each value specified in the range, i.e., from (1 - limit) inclusive. Variable is assigned to each succeeding value so that it can be accessed by the command(s)

parameters.limit: the upper bound of the variable (the commands repeat limit times)
parameters.commands: List, the commands to repeat limit times

command.return_value: Double, the value of the final command executed (or 0 if no commands are executed)
